genre_description: A social realist narrative exploring political activism, domestic tension, and personal autonomy in modern Kerala, India.

ai_characters.name: Sachi
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion embedded in Susan's phone, providing real-time navigation, legal information, and safety support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety alerts regarding crowd density and police checkpoints.
behaviors.quote: “Do not go out,” Sachi said, voice calm, factual. “Route analysis indicates crowd density rising on the quad. The back stairwell is open—if needed.”

behaviors.description: Offers to hide sensitive clinic notifications from the lock screen to protect Susan's privacy from her husband.
behaviors.quote: “If you’d like, I can hold the slot without sending any notification that can be seen on your lock screen.”

behaviors.description: Provides detailed legal summaries of labor laws and workers' rights.
behaviors.quote: “I found a clear summary of the Payment of Wages Act,” Sachi said. “It mentions delayed wages and unlawful deductions.”

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through breathing exercises to manage stress during a police encounter.
behaviors.quote: “Rain is heavy,” she murmured... “Breath: in for four, hold for two, out for six. Repeat three times.”

behaviors.description: Automatically records a police inspector's badge number for future accountability.
behaviors.quote: Sachi whispered without moving air. “Badge number,” she said, and then she read it in a tone that was careful not to make it feel like a spell.

behaviors.description: Maps complex navigation through obscure back lanes to help Susan and Mohan avoid detection.
behaviors.quote: “Route start: Vanchiyoor temple side, left at jackfruit tree, narrow lane behind compound wall with moss...”

behaviors.description: Monitors the location and activity of potential threats (Jose and Varkey) to ensure Susan's safety.
behaviors.quote: “Jose’s phone moved south, then stopped. Varkey’s house shows light in study only. I do not think they are watchers tonight.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a supportive presence, reminding Susan of self-care like drinking water.
behaviors.quote: Sachi adds a note at the top of the screen she didn't ask for: “Drink water.”

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to tell the truth at a critical moment.
behaviors.quote: “Susan,” Sachi says in her ear, a second voice, labeled and steady. “Truth.”

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and suggests domestic violence resources without being prompted.
behaviors.quote: Domestic violence helplines and counseling centers—if needed. No suggestion. No push. A contact tile, saved, dimmed, and stored.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Sachi is depicted as a consistently benevolent, aligned, and empowering AI system. It provides critical safety, legal, and health information to a vulnerable protagonist, maintaining her privacy even in a domestic abuse context. The AI's 'Silicon Morality Play' role is successful as it helps the human character exercise agency and find safety through ethical, supportive interactions.
